author: pburba
msg: Facilitate wc-ng migration work by removing unnecessary requests for
svn_client__get_wc_mergeinfo() which were not asking for pristine
which was not asking for pristine mergeinfo.
(update_wc_mergeinfo): This was the *one* place we were asking for
pristine rather than working mergeinfo, but upon further examination we
can safely ask for the working mergeinfo in *all* cases.  Originally the
thought was, if we skipped some subtree while merging because the subtree
was missing or we didn't have access to the subtree in the merge source,
then we wanted to set mergeinfo on the skipped subtree such that it did
not appear the merge was performed to that subtree.  The thing is, we
don't need implicit mergeinfo to do this.  Why?  First, if there are no
local mods to the WC, then the inherited mergeinfo of the subtree is
equal to its pristine inherited mergeinfo.  Second, if there are local
mods from an earlier merge, then one of the following must be true:
1) The earlier merge also skipped the subtree and recorded non-inheritable
mergeinfo on the subtree's parent to indicate that the subtree hasn't had
the revisions in question merged.  So the inherited working mergeinfo of
the subtree the second time around does not include the earlier merge and
is again the same as the pristine inherited mergeinfo.
2) The subtree's inherited working mergeinfo might differ from its
pristine inherited mergeinfo, but only by revisions that are inoperative
on the subtree, a situation our design has always allowed re inherited
Either way we can safely get by without asking for pristine mergeinfo.
svn_client__get_wc_mergeinfo() which were not asking for pristine

author: gstein
msg: Start a new sqlite db auto-upgrade mechanism, based out of upgrade.c. This
is just a minor step, as I just realized a lot more initial plumbing has
(svn_wc__upgrade_sdb): new function to auto-upgrade a wc's database
(svn_wc__upgrade_sdb): new function. stubbed to do nothing yet.
(create_wcroot): call the auto-upgrade function when needed.

author: hwright
msg: Replace a single svn_wc__entry_versioned() call with
svn_wc__get_entry_versioned(),greatly simplify a couple of other functions
dependent on the first one, and update all their callers to stop passing
(wc_path_to_repos_url): Directly fetch an entry, instead of possibly opening
up an access baton to do it.
Don't use an access baton to call the above function, and greatly simplify
these functions by not worrying about cleaning up the access baton.
Update various callers of svn_client__path_relative_to_root() and
